div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 742 Gorni Domljan, c. 40 km. N of Plov- div, Bulgaria, 1962 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 69 AR. In bronze vase Thasos: 16 st. Apollonia Pontica: 1 tetrob. Parium: 52 hemidr. Disposition: Karlovo Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 237
